Pregnancy Is Not an Illness Act of 2025
To prohibit the Department of Health and Human Services from treating pregnancy as an illness for purposes of approving abortion drugs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Pregnancy Is Not an Illness Act of 2025
This bill prohibits the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) from treating pregnancy as an illness for the purposes of approving any abortion drug or imposing a risk evaluation and mitigation strategy for an abortion drug. The bill also nullifies FDA approval of any abortion drug that relied at all on the treatment of pregnancy as an illness, and specifically nullifies the FDAâ€™s approval of the abortion drug mifepristone in effect before the bill is enacted.
